name: Great Slash
description: The signature Nail Art of Nailmaster Sheo. Unleashes a huge slash directly in front of you which deals extra damage to foes.

name: Dash Slash
description: The signature Nail Art of Nailmaster Oro. Strike ahead quickly after dashing forward.

name: Cyclone Slash
description: The signature Nail Art of Nailmaster Mato. A spinning attack that rapidly strikes foes on all sides.
